#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    lli r,x,y,xo,yo,v;
    cin >> t;
    while ( t-- ) {
        cin >> r >> x >> y >> xo >> yo >> v;
        lli val = (xo-x)*(xo-x) + (yo-y)*(yo-y) - r*r;
        if ( val >= 0 ) puts("0.000000");
        else {
            val += r*r;
            double val1 = (double)sqrt(val);
            double dis = (double)(r) - (double)val1;
            dis = (double)dis/(double)v;
            printf("%0.6lf\n", dis);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
